author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR contains some minor clean-ups post https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38304 merge.
Commits featured: 
   * [avoid memory leaks flagged by S.A.](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/6aa204a15061680d3514319d23e4980ea3d8d26f)
   * [improved test_all_cfg.py file](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/d354f264f53ae90ee4abc70a1724f28b56a5c3be)
   * [add custom messages to trackselectionRefitting](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/40a1c568f3168fa3e4edce135087646e11dd82d1)
   * [modernize JetHTAnalyzer](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/54ad1fd8b3ba9421f15412cea2f5563ffd6c0c90)
   * [update PV validations templates to run multi-threaded](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/c65bf5aeb615ee19b342673f6d1dc006e396e64f)
   * [use addWithDefaultLabel for fillDescriptions methods](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/8d0d14026f456fa650a42758c13ee206db57fdc8)
   * [update PV validations templates: print with # to avoid having python dump not runnable](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/cb6e812a9a8ee8aad67d858ee06ac011d1cee1bb)   

#### PR validation:

Run the unit tests of this package successfully.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: minor improvements to `Alignment/OfflineValidation`
